title: The Men of Otherworld: Collection One
description: A collection of short stories from New York Times, USA Today, and PW Bestselling Author Yasmine Galenorn, starring the men of Otherworld. In this collection:  The Hunger: What really happened to Rozurial and Fraale when Zeus and Hera showed up at their house?  Blood Ties: Roman's brother is coming to town, and it's not a happy family reunion.  Ink Bonds: Trillian's love for Camille drives him to seek her out, even a world away.  Chasing Sharah: Chase and Sharah have the most unexpected first date ever.  The Purr-Fect Weekend: Shade relishes the idea of a weekend alone with Delilah, until cat-astrophe turns it into one long fuzzy disaster.  These are the stories that can't fit into the actual novels.
author: Yasmine Galenorn
